data.name: PrivacySubtitle
data.value: Your privacy matters to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.

data.name: InformationWeCollectDesc
data.value: We collect personal information such as your name, email address, and usage data to improve your experience on StepWise. We only gather data you choose to provide.

data.name: HowWeUseYourDataDesc
data.value: Your data is used to personalize your learning journey, provide progress tracking, and connect you with relevant career content. We do not sell your data.

data.name: SecurityDesc
data.value: We use modern encryption and security protocols to keep your data safe. Our platform is designed with user privacy as a core principle.

data.name: YourControlsDesc
data.value: You can update or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings. We respect your choices and preferences.
